playlist_videos.title: üõèÔ∏è Ten in the Bed | Season 6 Full Episode 5 ‚≠ê | Learn to Count | @Numberblocks
playlist_videos.description:
It‚Äôs a starry night in Numberland, Ten is putting the Numberblobs to sleep on a 10-frame bed, with a special version of the nursery rhyme ‚ÄòTen in the Bed‚Äô. At first, the Numberblobs all roll over and fall out, one at a time, each time counting how many Numberblobs are left on the ten-frame bed. Embarking on an epic ride the bed turns into a rocket with Ten joining the rocket race and blasting up into space, and narrowly avoiding an asteroid. The Numberblobs abort the bed and use Ten as their bed, as she safely transports them back to Numberland and finally sends them to sleep.

playlist_videos.title: üöÄ Go Go Domino | Season 6 Full Episode 4 ‚≠ê | Learn to Count | @Numberblocks
playlist_videos.description:
One, Two, Three, Four and Five are playing dominoes in the Pattern Palace. The aim of the game is to reach the golden double six domino by building a path of dominoes along the way.
Each level of the game contains different patterns, the first level has dot patterns, the second level contains numerals, level three features blocks in the form of numbers and level four contains colourful pie charts all the way until they reach the golden double six domino and win a prize.

Enjoy the new Numberblocks Episodes, have fun and learn maths the fun way!

playlist_videos.title: üöÄ Rockets and Rekenreks |  Season 6 Full Episode 14 ‚≠ê | Learn to Count | @Numberblocks
playlist_videos.description:
Ten is launching her rocket rides into space for various characters, using a rekenrek, an object with five red beads and five white beads. The rekenrek helps calculate how many beads are needed per rocket ride, and translates that value into pennies, including helping to calculate change. The decablobs, from planet ten arrive, but Ten needs a bigger rekenrek to work out the cost of their journey. Using a bigger rekenrek, they work out a bigger value of beads and calculate that into pennies, launching another great rocket ride for the decablobs.

playlist_videos.title: üèÄ Can we have our ball back? | Season 6 Full Episode 7 ‚≠ê | Learn to Count | @Numberblocks
playlist_videos.description:
One and Four are playing a game of football with Two and Three, set against the backdrop of Flatland. Four boots the ball into Flatland it turns into a small red circle, awakening Flatland Four who explores the surfaces of the 3D Numberblocks. With his new findings, he learns to make 3D shapes using 2D shapes i.e. six squares joined together make a cube or a series of triangles help to make a pyramid. Eventually, the Numberblocks learn more about shapes and how to get their ball back from a circle to a sphere.

playlist_videos.description:
Five has a handy new shop hoping to get lots of new customers. Her first customer is One, who wants to buy some items and learns about the value of items versus the cost of them. Soon comes Nine, who wants a bunch of flowers, costing nine pennies, with the help of Five‚Äôs handy coin machine, she changes five penny coins into one five penny coin, making it easier to carry. Whilst Eleven learns about higher value coins, as he has so many coins to carry. Five is happy to have had a successful day at her new shop.

playlist_videos.title: ü¶ë Octoblock and the Path of Justice | Season 6 Full Episode 10 ‚≠ê | Learn to Count | @Numberblocks
playlist_videos.description:
Octonaughty is up to another prank in the town centre and Octoblock must track him down, using a map from Octocomputer. The map gives him an overview of the whole town and he learns to line the map up with what he sees physically and uses that to locate Octonaughty. When the two meet, Octonaughty grabs hold of a rubber duck and using his resizing ray, makes the duck ginormous with the ambition of making the biggest bubble bath, ever he dashes off to Triangle Lake.
Octoblock needs a shortcut this time and to use his map again, on route he finds the resizing  ray and locates Octonaughty along with the giant rubber duck. Octoblock saves the day, resizes the duck and a very frustrated Octonaughty.

playlist_videos.description:
One is on her way to Numberblock Fair with a map to help get her there. As she begins her journey she discovers the map has disappeared. Two starts her off, with the use of positional language, directing her to go over a bridge and turn left at a track. One soon gets stuck again, and meets Three, who directs her using more positional language and reiterating the learns of left and right. One finally makes it to Numberblock Fair, and meets her friends there, only to discover they used the shortcut!

The first 5 numbers and zero
Zero
One
Two
Three
Four
Five
Addition
Subtraction
Greater than, less than and equal

---

Welcome to Numberland!

BAFTA award-winning Numberblocks helps children to see how numbers really work ‚àí and master a new key maths skill with every adventure. It‚Äôs a story of friends who can always count on each other ‚àí but, most of all, Numberblocks is about having fun with numbers.

Each episode has been carefully crafted with the help of the NCETM (National Centre for Excellence in the Teaching of Mathematics) and brought to life by Blue Zoo Animation Studio.
We work closely with the NCETM to make sure Numberblocks delivers the essential numeracy skills that build good number sense and a solid foundation for a lifetime of maths success.
‚Äç
Get ready for an animated adventure and some number magic that you can count on to help your child learn maths in the most exciting way.
1, 2, 3 ‚àí Let‚Äôs go!

Numberblocks has been nominated for the prestigious BAFTA, Prix Jeunesse and The Japan Prize Audiovisual Pre-school awards, and received a BAFTA for Children's Preschool Animation in 2019. Numberblocks is also featured among the DfE's recommended resources for home learning and is part of BBC Bitesize Daily.

Where to watch Numberblocks

Numberblocks is designed so your child can just press play and have fun while learning essential number skills. 90 episodes take them from number names and counting to a deep understanding of how addition, subtraction, multiplication and division work, via a host of key concepts in between. You can find your favourite characters and episodes on TV, BBC iPlayer, DVD or the Numberblocks YouTube channels

---

What happens when numbers come to life?

Dive into a world of number fun with the hit CBeebies show, Numberblocks. Award-winning characters + big adventures + singalong songs = the best way to get children excited about everything numbers can do!

It's easy when you see it!

Maths is SO much easier when you can see how it works. 90 episodes bring hundreds of essential number skills to life with big visuals and amazing animation, from your first encounter with One to mini-musicals, classic comedy, song-and-dance numbers and a nail-biting escape from the double dungeon of doom!

A comprehensive learning journey

The learning goals behind Numberblocks support maths curricula from around the world, taking young learners step by step through the key topics and skills they need to master for a confident start and a lifelong love of numbers.

Play and learn

Brilliant Numberblocks apps help children take the learning into their own hands.

Get hands-on

Take the learning further with the Numberblocks Maths Programme ‚àí three bumper magazines packed with stickers, colouring and step-by-step hands-on learning activities, plus a special set of Numberblocks blocks.

Let's stay in touch!

We love to hear from you ‚àí your ideas, questions and your little ones‚Äô fantastic creations. Keep up to date with the latest Numberblocks news by following us @Numberblocks on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter and signing up to the Numberblocks Newsletter. Every Monday we share some of your home and school creations, artwork and bakes on Facebook and Instagram so please send us your photos!

Numbers from 1-10

Eight
Nine
Ten
Flatlanders
3D shapes
Patterns
Odds and evens
Number bonds

Sixteen

Money, length and weight

---

Welcome to Numberland!

BAFTA award-winning Numberblocks helps children to see how numbers really work ‚àí and master a new key maths skill with every adventure. It‚Äôs a story of friends who can always count on each other ‚àí but, most of all, Numberblocks is about having fun with numbers.

Each episode has been carefully crafted with the help of the NCETM (National Centre for Excellence in the Teaching of Mathematics) and brought to life by Blue Zoo Animation Studio.
We work closely with the NCETM to make sure Numberblocks delivers the essential numeracy skills that build good number sense and a solid foundation for a lifetime of maths success.
‚Äç
Get ready for an animated adventure and some number magic that you can count on to help your child learn maths in the most exciting way.
1, 2, 3 ‚àí Let‚Äôs go!

Numberblocks has been nominated for the prestigious BAFTA, Prix Jeunesse and The Japan Prize Audiovisual Pre-school awards, and received a BAFTA for Children's Preschool Animation in 2019. Numberblocks is also featured among the DfE's recommended resources for home learning and is part of BBC Bitesize Daily.

Where to watch Numberblocks

Numberblocks is designed so your child can just press play and have fun while learning essential number skills. 90 episodes take them from number names and counting to a deep understanding of how addition, subtraction, multiplication and division work, via a host of key concepts in between. You can find your favourite characters and episodes on TV, BBC iPlayer, DVD or the Numberblocks YouTube channels

---

What happens when numbers come to life?

Dive into a world of number fun with the hit CBeebies show, Numberblocks. Award-winning characters + big adventures + singalong songs = the best way to get children excited about everything numbers can do!

It's easy when you see it!

Maths is SO much easier when you can see how it works. 90 episodes bring hundreds of essential number skills to life with big visuals and amazing animation, from your first encounter with One to mini-musicals, classic comedy, song-and-dance numbers and a nail-biting escape from the double dungeon of doom!

A comprehensive learning journey

The learning goals behind Numberblocks support maths curricula from around the world, taking young learners step by step through the key topics and skills they need to master for a confident start and a lifelong love of numbers.

Play and learn

Brilliant Numberblocks apps help children take the learning into their own hands.

Get hands-on

Take the learning further with the Numberblocks Maths Programme ‚àí three bumper magazines packed with stickers, colouring and step-by-step hands-on learning activities, plus a special set of Numberblocks blocks.

Let's stay in touch!

We love to hear from you ‚àí your ideas, questions and your little ones‚Äô fantastic creations. Keep up to date with the latest Numberblocks news by following us @Numberblocks on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter and signing up to the Numberblocks Newsletter. Every Monday we share some of your home and school creations, artwork and bakes on Facebook and Instagram so please send us your photos!

---

---

Welcome to Numberland!

BAFTA award-winning Numberblocks helps children to see how numbers really work ‚àí and master a new key maths skill with every adventure. It‚Äôs a story of friends who can always count on each other ‚àí but, most of all, Numberblocks is about having fun with numbers.

Each episode has been carefully crafted with the help of the NCETM (National Centre for Excellence in the Teaching of Mathematics) and brought to life by Blue Zoo Animation Studio.
We work closely with the NCETM to make sure Numberblocks delivers the essential numeracy skills that build good number sense and a solid foundation for a lifetime of maths success.
‚Äç
Get ready for an animated adventure and some number magic that you can count on to help your child learn maths in the most exciting way.
1, 2, 3 ‚àí Let‚Äôs go!

Numberblocks has been nominated for the prestigious BAFTA, Prix Jeunesse and The Japan Prize Audiovisual Pre-school awards, and received a BAFTA for Children's Preschool Animation in 2019. Numberblocks is also featured among the DfE's recommended resources for home learning and is part of BBC Bitesize Daily.

Where to watch Numberblocks

Numberblocks is designed so your child can just press play and have fun while learning essential number skills. 90 episodes take them from number names and counting to a deep understanding of how addition, subtraction, multiplication and division work, via a host of key concepts in between. You can find your favourite characters and episodes on TV, BBC iPlayer, DVD or the Numberblocks YouTube channels

---

What happens when numbers come to life?

Dive into a world of number fun with the hit CBeebies show, Numberblocks. Award-winning characters + big adventures + singalong songs = the best way to get children excited about everything numbers can do!

It's easy when you see it!

Maths is SO much easier when you can see how it works. 90 episodes bring hundreds of essential number skills to life with big visuals and amazing animation, from your first encounter with One to mini-musicals, classic comedy, song-and-dance numbers and a nail-biting escape from the double dungeon of doom!

A comprehensive learning journey

The learning goals behind Numberblocks support maths curricula from around the world, taking young learners step by step through the key topics and skills they need to master for a confident start and a lifelong love of numbers.

Play and learn

Brilliant Numberblocks apps help children take the learning into their own hands.

Get hands-on

Take the learning further with the Numberblocks Maths Programme ‚àí three bumper magazines packed with stickers, colouring and step-by-step hands-on learning activities, plus a special set of Numberblocks blocks.

Let's stay in touch!

We love to hear from you ‚àí your ideas, questions and your little ones‚Äô fantastic creations. Keep up to date with the latest Numberblocks news by following us @Numberblocks on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter and signing up to the Numberblocks Newsletter. Every Monday we share some of your home and school creations, artwork and bakes on Facebook and Instagram so please send us your photos!

Welcome to the Ultimate Numberblocks Learning Compilation! Join your favorite Numberblocks characters in an exciting adventure filled with engaging, fun, and educational episodes. Perfect for preschoolers, this compilation covers a variety of essential math concepts such as patterns, shapes, counting, measuring, and much more. Our playful Numberblocks are here to make learning enjoyable and memorable for kids. Dive into the world of numbers and discover the magic of math with Numberblocks!

Expand your child‚Äôs learning journey with the Numberblocks! This compilation features beloved characters engaging in playful and educational activities, making early math concepts easy to understand and fun to learn. Designed for preschoolers, toddlers, and early learners, our video integrates captivating storytelling with foundational math skills. Perfect for parents, teachers, and caregivers seeking high-quality educational content for kids.

Why Choose Numberblocks?
Numberblocks is a trusted educational series that combines vibrant animation and engaging storylines to teach children important math concepts. By watching Numberblocks, children can develop a strong foundation in numbers, counting, addition, subtraction, shapes, patterns, measurement, and more. Each episode is crafted to promote problem-solving skills, critical thinking, and creativity, all while keeping children entertained and engaged.

Key Learning Objectives:
Counting & Numbers: Basic counting, skip counting, and recognizing number bonds.
Addition & Subtraction: Simple addition and subtraction with visual aids.
Shapes & Patterns: Identifying 2D and 3D shapes, and recognizing patterns.
Measurement: Understanding length, weight, and positional language.
Probability & Money: Introducing basic probability and the value of money.


How to Get the Most Out of This Video:
Interactive Viewing: Pause the video to ask your child questions about what they see. This encourages active engagement and reinforces learning.
Repetition: Rewatching episodes helps solidify the concepts in your child‚Äôs mind.
Supplemental Activities: Combine viewing with activity sheets from our website like drawing shapes, counting objects, or playing with building blocks.

Welcome to Numberland!

BAFTA award-winning Numberblocks helps children to see how numbers really work ‚àí and master a new key maths skill with every adventure. It‚Äôs a story of friends who can always count on each other ‚àí but, most of all, Numberblocks is about having fun with numbers.

Each episode has been carefully crafted with the help of the NCETM (National Centre for Excellence in the Teaching of Mathematics) and brought to life by Blue Zoo Animation Studio.
We work closely with the NCETM to make sure Numberblocks delivers the essential numeracy skills that build good number sense and a solid foundation for a lifetime of maths success.
‚Äç
Get ready for an animated adventure and some number magic that you can count on to help your child learn maths in the most exciting way.
1, 2, 3 ‚àí Let‚Äôs go!

Numberblocks has been nominated for the prestigious BAFTA, Prix Jeunesse and The Japan Prize Audiovisual Pre-school awards, and received a BAFTA for Children's Preschool Animation in 2019. Numberblocks is also featured among the DfE's recommended resources for home learning and is part of BBC Bitesize Daily.

Where to watch Numberblocks

Numberblocks is designed so your child can just press play and have fun while learning essential number skills. 90 episodes take them from number names and counting to a deep understanding of how addition, subtraction, multiplication and division work, via a host of key concepts in between. You can find your favourite characters and episodes on TV, BBC iPlayer, DVD or the Numberblocks YouTube channels

---

What happens when numbers come to life?

Dive into a world of number fun with the hit CBeebies show, Numberblocks. Award-winning characters + big adventures + singalong songs = the best way to get children excited about everything numbers can do!

It's easy when you see it!

Maths is SO much easier when you can see how it works. 90 episodes bring hundreds of essential number skills to life with big visuals and amazing animation, from your first encounter with One to mini-musicals, classic comedy, song-and-dance numbers and a nail-biting escape from the double dungeon of doom!

A comprehensive learning journey

The learning goals behind Numberblocks support maths curricula from around the world, taking young learners step by step through the key topics and skills they need to master for a confident start and a lifelong love of numbers.

Play and learn

Brilliant Numberblocks apps help children take the learning into their own hands.

Get hands-on

Take the learning further with the Numberblocks Maths Programme ‚àí three bumper magazines packed with stickers, colouring and step-by-step hands-on learning activities, plus a special set of Numberblocks blocks.

Let's stay in touch!

We love to hear from you ‚àí your ideas, questions and your little ones‚Äô fantastic creations. Keep up to date with the latest Numberblocks news by following us @Numberblocks on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter and signing up to the Numberblocks Newsletter. Every Monday we share some of your home and school creations, artwork and bakes on Facebook and Instagram so please send us your photos!

---

Welcome to Numberland!

BAFTA award-winning Numberblocks helps children to see how numbers really work ‚àí and master a new key maths skill with every adventure. It‚Äôs a story of friends who can always count on each other ‚àí but, most of all, Numberblocks is about having fun with numbers.

Each episode has been carefully crafted with the help of the NCETM (National Centre for Excellence in the Teaching of Mathematics) and brought to life by Blue Zoo Animation Studio.
We work closely with the NCETM to make sure Numberblocks delivers the essential numeracy skills that build good number sense and a solid foundation for a lifetime of maths success.
‚Äç
Get ready for an animated adventure and some number magic that you can count on to help your child learn maths in the most exciting way.
1, 2, 3 ‚àí Let‚Äôs go!

Numberblocks has been nominated for the prestigious BAFTA, Prix Jeunesse and The Japan Prize Audiovisual Pre-school awards, and received a BAFTA for Children's Preschool Animation in 2019. Numberblocks is also featured among the DfE's recommended resources for home learning and is part of BBC Bitesize Daily.

Where to watch Numberblocks

Numberblocks is designed so your child can just press play and have fun while learning essential number skills. 90 episodes take them from number names and counting to a deep understanding of how addition, subtraction, multiplication and division work, via a host of key concepts in between. You can find your favourite characters and episodes on TV, BBC iPlayer, DVD or the Numberblocks YouTube channels

---

What happens when numbers come to life?

Dive into a world of number fun with the hit CBeebies show, Numberblocks. Award-winning characters + big adventures + singalong songs = the best way to get children excited about everything numbers can do!

It's easy when you see it!

Maths is SO much easier when you can see how it works. 90 episodes bring hundreds of essential number skills to life with big visuals and amazing animation, from your first encounter with One to mini-musicals, classic comedy, song-and-dance numbers and a nail-biting escape from the double dungeon of doom!

A comprehensive learning journey

The learning goals behind Numberblocks support maths curricula from around the world, taking young learners step by step through the key topics and skills they need to master for a confident start and a lifelong love of numbers.

Play and learn

Brilliant Numberblocks apps help children take the learning into their own hands.

Get hands-on

Take the learning further with the Numberblocks Maths Programme ‚àí three bumper magazines packed with stickers, colouring and step-by-step hands-on learning activities, plus a special set of Numberblocks blocks.

Let's stay in touch!

We love to hear from you ‚àí your ideas, questions and your little ones‚Äô fantastic creations. Keep up to date with the latest Numberblocks news by following us @Numberblocks on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter and signing up to the Numberblocks Newsletter. Every Monday we share some of your home and school creations, artwork and bakes on Facebook and Instagram so please send us your photos!

---

BAFTA award-winning Numberblocks helps children to see how numbers really work ‚àí and master a new key maths skill with every adventure. It‚Äôs a story of friends who can always count on each other ‚àí but, most of all, Numberblocks is about having fun with numbers.

Each episode has been carefully crafted with the help of the NCETM (National Centre for Excellence in the Teaching of Mathematics) and brought to life by Blue Zoo Animation Studio.
We work closely with the NCETM to make sure Numberblocks delivers the essential numeracy skills that build good number sense and a solid foundation for a lifetime of maths success.
‚Äç
Get ready for an animated adventure and some number magic that you can count on to help your child learn maths in the most exciting way.
1, 2, 3 ‚àí Let‚Äôs go!

Numberblocks has been nominated for the prestigious BAFTA, Prix Jeunesse and The Japan Prize Audiovisual Pre-school awards, and received a BAFTA for Children's Preschool Animation in 2019. Numberblocks is also featured among the DfE's recommended resources for home learning and is part of BBC Bitesize Daily.

Where to watch Numberblocks

Numberblocks is designed so your child can just press play and have fun while learning essential number skills. 90 episodes take them from number names and counting to a deep understanding of how addition, subtraction, multiplication and division work, via a host of key concepts in between. You can find your favourite characters and episodes on TV, BBC iPlayer, DVD or the Numberblocks YouTube channels

---

What happens when numbers come to life?

Dive into a world of number fun with the hit CBeebies show, Numberblocks. Award-winning characters + big adventures + singalong songs = the best way to get children excited about everything numbers can do!

It's easy when you see it!

Maths is SO much easier when you can see how it works. 90 episodes bring hundreds of essential number skills to life with big visuals and amazing animation, from your first encounter with One to mini-musicals, classic comedy, song-and-dance numbers and a nail-biting escape from the double dungeon of doom!

A comprehensive learning journey

The learning goals behind Numberblocks support maths curricula from around the world, taking young learners step by step through the key topics and skills they need to master for a confident start and a lifelong love of numbers.

Play and learn

Brilliant Numberblocks apps help children take the learning into their own hands.

Get hands-on

Take the learning further with the Numberblocks Maths Programme ‚àí three bumper magazines packed with stickers, colouring and step-by-step hands-on learning activities, plus a special set of Numberblocks blocks.

Let's stay in touch!

We love to hear from you ‚àí your ideas, questions and your little ones‚Äô fantastic creations. Keep up to date with the latest Numberblocks news by following us @Numberblocks on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter and signing up to the Numberblocks Newsletter. Every Monday we share some of your home and school creations, artwork and bakes on Facebook and Instagram so please send us your photos!

Perfect for parents, teachers, and caregivers seeking high-quality educational content for kids.

Why Choose Numberblocks?
Numberblocks is a trusted educational series that combines vibrant animation and engaging storylines to teach children important math concepts. By watching Numberblocks, children can develop a strong foundation in numbers, counting, addition, subtraction, shapes, patterns, measurement, and more. Each episode is crafted to promote problem-solving skills, critical thinking, and creativity, all while keeping children entertained and engaged.

Key Learning Objectives:
Counting & Numbers: Basic counting, skip counting, and recognizing number bonds.
Addition & Subtraction: Simple addition and subtraction with visual aids.
Shapes & Patterns: Identifying 2D and 3D shapes, and recognizing patterns.
Measurement: Understanding length, weight, and positional language.
Probability & Money: Introducing basic probability and the value of money.


How to Get the Most Out of This Video:
Interactive Viewing: Pause the video to ask your child questions about what they see. This encourages active engagement and reinforces learning.
Repetition: Rewatching episodes helps solidify the concepts in your child‚Äôs mind.
Supplemental Activities: Combine viewing with activity sheets from our website like drawing shapes, counting objects, or playing with building blocks.

A comprehensive learning journey

Welcome to Numberland!

BAFTA award-winning Numberblocks helps children to see how numbers really work ‚àí and master a new key maths skill with every adventure. It‚Äôs a story of friends who can always count on each other ‚àí but, most of all, Numberblocks is about having fun with numbers.

Each episode has been carefully crafted with the help of the NCETM (National Centre for Excellence in the Teaching of Mathematics) and brought to life by Blue Zoo Animation Studio.
We work closely with the NCETM to make sure Numberblocks delivers the essential numeracy skills that build good number sense and a solid foundation for a lifetime of maths success.
‚Äç
Get ready for an animated adventure and some number magic that you can count on to help your child learn maths in the most exciting way.
1, 2, 3 ‚àí Let‚Äôs go!

Numberblocks has been nominated for the prestigious BAFTA, Prix Jeunesse and The Japan Prize Audiovisual Pre-school awards, and received a BAFTA for Children's Preschool Animation in 2019. Numberblocks is also featured among the DfE's recommended resources for home learning and is part of BBC Bitesize Daily.

Where to watch Numberblocks

Numberblocks is designed so your child can just press play and have fun while learning essential number skills. 90 episodes take them from number names and counting to a deep understanding of how addition, subtraction, multiplication and division work, via a host of key concepts in between. You can find your favourite characters and episodes on TV, BBC iPlayer, DVD or the Numberblocks YouTube channels

Welcome to Numberland!

BAFTA award-winning Numberblocks helps children to see how numbers really work ‚àí and master a new key maths skill with every adventure. It‚Äôs a story of friends who can always count on each other ‚àí but, most of all, Numberblocks is about having fun with numbers.

Each episode has been carefully crafted with the help of the NCETM (National Centre for Excellence in the Teaching of Mathematics) and brought to life by Blue Zoo Animation Studio.
We work closely with the NCETM to make sure Numberblocks delivers the essential numeracy skills that build good number sense and a solid foundation for a lifetime of maths success.
‚Äç
Get ready for an animated adventure and some number magic that you can count on to help your child learn maths in the most exciting way. 1, 2, 3 ‚àí Let‚Äôs go!

Numberblocks has been nominated for the prestigious BAFTA, Prix Jeunesse and The Japan Prize Audiovisual Pre-school awards, and received a BAFTA for Children's Preschool Animation in 2019. Numberblocks is also featured among the DfE's recommended resources for home learning and is part of BBC Bitesize Daily.

Where to watch Numberblocks

Numberblocks is designed so your child can just press play and have fun while learning essential number skills. 90 episodes take them from number names and counting to a deep understanding of how addition, subtraction, multiplication and division work, via a host of key concepts in between. You can find your favourite characters and episodes on TV, BBC iPlayer, DVD or the Numberblocks YouTube channels.

---

What happens when numbers come to life?

Dive into a world of number fun with the hit CBeebies show, Numberblocks. Award-winning characters + big adventures + singalong songs = the best way to get children excited about everything numbers can do!

It's easy when you see it!

Maths is SO much easier when you can see how it works. 90 episodes bring hundreds of essential number skills to life with big visuals and amazing animation, from your first encounter with One to mini-musicals, classic comedy, song-and-dance numbers and a nail-biting escape from the double dungeon of doom!

A comprehensive learning journey

The learning goals behind Numberblocks support maths curricula from around the world, taking young learners step by step through the key topics and skills they need to master for a confident start and a lifelong love of numbers.

Play and learn

Brilliant Numberblocks apps help children take the learning into their own hands.

Get hands-on

Take the learning further with the Numberblocks Maths Programme ‚àí three bumper magazines packed with stickers, colouring and step-by-step hands-on learning activities, plus a special set of Numberblocks blocks.

Let's stay in touch!

We love to hear from you ‚àí your ideas, questions and your little ones‚Äô fantastic creations. Keep up to date with the latest Numberblocks news by following us @Numberblocks on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter and signing up to the Numberblocks Newsletter. Every Monday we share some of your home and school creations, artwork and bakes on Facebook and Instagram so please send us your photos!

BAFTA award-winning Numberblocks helps children to see how numbers really work ‚àí and master a new key maths skill with every adventure. It‚Äôs a story of friends who can always count on each other ‚àí but, most of all, Numberblocks is about having fun with numbers.

Each episode has been carefully crafted with the help of the NCETM (National Centre for Excellence in the Teaching of Mathematics) and brought to life by Blue Zoo Animation Studio.
We work closely with the NCETM to make sure Numberblocks delivers the essential numeracy skills that build good number sense and a solid foundation for a lifetime of maths success.
‚Äç
Get ready for an animated adventure and some number magic that you can count on to help your child learn maths in the most exciting way.
1, 2, 3 ‚àí Let‚Äôs go!

Numberblocks has been nominated for the prestigious BAFTA, Prix Jeunesse and The Japan Prize Audiovisual Pre-school awards, and received a BAFTA for Children's Preschool Animation in 2019. Numberblocks is also featured among the DfE's recommended resources for home learning and is part of BBC Bitesize Daily.

Where to watch Numberblocks

Numberblocks is designed so your child can just press play and have fun while learning essential number skills. 90 episodes take them from number names and counting to a deep understanding of how addition, subtraction, multiplication and division work, via a host of key concepts in between. You can find your favourite characters and episodes on TV, BBC iPlayer, DVD or the Numberblocks YouTube channels

---

What happens when numbers come to life?

Dive into a world of number fun with the hit CBeebies show, Numberblocks. Award-winning characters + big adventures + singalong songs = the best way to get children excited about everything numbers can do!

It's easy when you see it!

Maths is SO much easier when you can see how it works. 90 episodes bring hundreds of essential number skills to life with big visuals and amazing animation, from your first encounter with One to mini-musicals, classic comedy, song-and-dance numbers and a nail-biting escape from the double dungeon of doom!

A comprehensive learning journey

The learning goals behind Numberblocks support maths curricula from around the world, taking young learners step by step through the key topics and skills they need to master for a confident start and a lifelong love of numbers.

Play and learn

Brilliant Numberblocks apps help children take the learning into their own hands.

Get hands-on

Take the learning further with the Numberblocks Maths Programme ‚àí three bumper magazines packed with stickers, colouring and step-by-step hands-on learning activities, plus a special set of Numberblocks blocks.

Let's stay in touch!

We love to hear from you ‚àí your ideas, questions and your little ones‚Äô fantastic creations. Keep up to date with the latest Numberblocks news by following us @Numberblocks on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter and signing up to the Numberblocks Newsletter. Every Monday we share some of your home and school creations, artwork and bakes on Facebook and Instagram so please send us your photos!

playlist_videos.title: üöÄ REAL Numberblock 10 BLASTS OFF INTO SPACE! üåü |  Numberblocks Maths Science Adventure LIVESTREAM!
playlist_videos.description:
Get ready for an epic journey beyond the clouds! Join us for Numberblock 10's Galactic Adventure as we launch our brave Numberblock 10 toy high into the sky using a real weather balloon! Watch in amazement as Numberblock 10 ascends through the atmosphere, reaches the edge of space, and returns safely to Earth. This incredible mission is brought to you by the Numberblocks team and is sure to captivate kids, parents, and teachers alike.

Don't miss this spectacular event! Tune in to watch Numberblock 10's space adventure and explore the wonders of numbers and space together!

üî¢ Highlights:

Amazing Journey: Witness Numberblock 10 travel from Earth to the edge of space.
Educational Fun: Learn about numbers, space, and science in an exciting new way.
Interactive Content: Perfect for children, teachers, and parents to enjoy together.
Spectacular Views: Experience stunning visuals of Numberblock 10‚Äôs journey through the atmosphere.
Fun Facts: Discover fascinating information about space and numbers.
Music and Magic: Enjoy catchy songs and magical moments with Numberblock 10.


This event is designed to be both fun and educational, combining the joy of learning with the thrill of a space adventure. It's ideal for preschoolers, kindergarteners, and early elementary school children, but parents and teachers will love it too!

Why You‚Äôll Love It:

For Kids: This adventure is packed with fun, engaging content that will capture the imagination of young children. Numberblock 10‚Äôs journey to space is filled with exciting visuals, catchy songs, and magical moments that make learning numbers an adventure.
For Parents: This livestream offers a fantastic way to combine screen time with educational value. Your children will be entertained while they learn essential math skills, all in a safe and family-friendly format.
For Teachers: Use this exciting event as a teaching tool in the classroom. It‚Äôs perfect for introducing concepts of counting, addition, and even early science related to space and weather balloons. It's aligned with early years foundation stage (EYFS) and key stage 1 curriculum standards.
Join the Numberblocks on this unforgettable space adventure and spark a love of learning in your little ones!

Welcome to Numberland!

BAFTA award-winning Numberblocks helps children to see how numbers really work ‚àí and master a new key maths skill with every adventure. It‚Äôs a story of friends who can always count on each other ‚àí but, most of all, Numberblocks is about having fun with numbers.

Each episode has been carefully crafted with the help of the NCETM (National Centre for Excellence in the Teaching of Mathematics) and brought to life by Blue Zoo Animation Studio.
We work closely with the NCETM to make sure Numberblocks delivers the essential numeracy skills that build good number sense and a solid foundation for a lifetime of maths success.
‚Äç
Get ready for an animated adventure and some number magic that you can count on to help your child learn maths in the most exciting way.
1, 2, 3 ‚àí Let‚Äôs go!

Numberblocks has been nominated for the prestigious BAFTA, Prix Jeunesse and The Japan Prize Audiovisual Pre-school awards, and received a BAFTA for Children's Preschool Animation in 2019. Numberblocks is also featured among the DfE's recommended resources for home learning and is part of BBC Bitesize Daily.

Where to watch Numberblocks

Numberblocks is designed so your child can just press play and have fun while learning essential number skills. 90 episodes take them from number names and counting to a deep understanding of how addition, subtraction, multiplication and division work, via a host of key concepts in between. You can find your favourite characters and episodes on TV, BBC iPlayer, DVD or the Numberblocks YouTube channels

---

What happens when numbers come to life?

Dive into a world of number fun with the hit CBeebies show, Numberblocks. Award-winning characters + big adventures + singalong songs = the best way to get children excited about everything numbers can do!

It's easy when you see it!

Maths is SO much easier when you can see how it works. 90 episodes bring hundreds of essential number skills to life with big visuals and amazing animation, from your first encounter with One to mini-musicals, classic comedy, song-and-dance numbers and a nail-biting escape from the double dungeon of doom!

A comprehensive learning journey

The learning goals behind Numberblocks support maths curricula from around the world, taking young learners step by step through the key topics and skills they need to master for a confident start and a lifelong love of numbers.

Play and learn

Brilliant Numberblocks apps help children take the learning into their own hands.

Get hands-on

Take the learning further with the Numberblocks Maths Programme ‚àí three bumper magazines packed with stickers, colouring and step-by-step hands-on learning activities, plus a special set of Numberblocks blocks.

Let's stay in touch!

We love to hear from you ‚àí your ideas, questions and your little ones‚Äô fantastic creations. Keep up to date with the latest Numberblocks news by following us @Numberblocks on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter and signing up to the Numberblocks Newsletter. Every Monday we share some of your home and school creations, artwork and bakes on Facebook and Instagram so please send us your photos!
